short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear browser cache in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-Click Cache Cleaner is a simple and effective Chrome extension designed to help users clear their browser cache, cookies, and history with just a few clicks. Whether you're troubleshooting browser performance, freeing up storage space, or maintaining privacy, this extension makes it fast and easy to clear the data you no longer need.

Features:

Clear browser cache, cookies, and history with a single click.
Select specific data types to clear or remove everything at once.
Choose a time range for data removal (last hour, last day, last week, or all time).
Simple, minimalistic design with a smooth user experience.
Works efficiently without slowing down your browser.
Ideal for developers, privacy-conscious users, and those who want to keep their browser running smoothly.
